text: Dee Henderson is an author of Christian fiction novels within the inspirational romantic suspense genre; she has won various awards for her writing and been on the New York Times Bestseller list."Woman authors New York Times Best Seller" Journal Gazette (Mattoon, Illinois), November 20, 2012, p. 13 ==Personal life== Dee Henderson is a lifelong inhabitant of Illinois, currently residing in Springfield. She is the daughter of a pastor and started writing as a child.Interview with Susan Sleeman, accessed 9/30/2018 https://www.susansleeman.com/meet-romantic-suspense-author-dee-henderson/ Henderson graduated from the University of Illinois in 1988 with a B.S. in computer science http://cs.illinois.edu/sites/default/files/files/newsletters/summer01.pdf and worked for a decade as an engineer before starting to publish professionally.Juli Cragg Hilliard, "Dee Henderson: What to Say About God" http://www.publishersweekly.com/pw/by-topic/industry- news/religion/article/53694-dee-henderson-what-to-say-about-god.html She started writing fiction for publication in 1996.http://www.familyfiction.com/authors/dee-henderson/features/dee- henderson-back-with-full-disclosure/ Henderson is single and enjoys painting, reading, walking around her subdivision, and spending time with her dogs.Interview with Susan Sleeman, accessed 9/30/2018 https://www.susansleeman.com/meet-romantic-suspense-author-dee-henderson/ She still attends church at her childhood church.Interview with Susan Sleeman, accessed 9/30/2018 https://www.susansleeman.com/meet-romantic-suspense-author- dee-henderson/ Publishers Weekly described Henderson one of the "bestselling and perennial favorites" published by Bethany House, a division of Baker Publishing Group.Ann Byle, "For Christian Fiction Editors, It’s Complicated," Publishers Weekly, Feb 07, 2014, https://www.publishersweekly.com/pw/by- topic/industry-news/religion/article/60969-religion-update-february-2014-for- christian-fiction-editors-it-s-complicated.html ==Awards== Henderson has won or been nominated for various writing awards including: Romance Writers of America's RITA Award, the Christy Award, the Evangelical Christian Publishers Association Gold Medallion, the Holt Medallion, the National Readers' Choice Award,"FL Public Library Adds new romance author," Daily Citizen (Beaver Dam, Wisconsin) 15 Mar 2001, p. 14 and the Golden Quill. ==Published works== O’Malley Series *1.
